metadata.title: CVE-2021-4155 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A data leak flaw was found in the way XFS_IOC_ALLOCSP IOCTL in the XFSfilesystem allowed for size increase of files with unaligned size. A localattacker could use this flaw to leak data on the XFS filesystem otherwisenot accessible to them.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
